Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for network security, connectivity, and scalability. Identify the applications and services that will use Azure vWAN Secure Hub.
Design the network architecture, including hub locations, spoke connections, and integration with existing on-premises and Azure networks.
Provision the Azure vWAN hub in the desired region. Ensure the hub is configured to support secure connectivity and firewall management.
Set up firewall policies in Firewall Manager, including rules for inbound and outbound traffic, threat intelligence, and application filtering.
Configure secure connectivity between the vWAN hub and spokes using VPN or ExpressRoute. Ensure encryption and failover mechanisms are in place.
Enable advanced security features such as Azure Firewall Premium, threat intelligence-based filtering, and DDoS protection.
Perform thorough testing of the network connectivity and security configurations, including failover scenarios and firewall rule validation.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Firewall Manager. Configure alerts for network performance, security incidents, and policy violations.
Document the network architecture, firewall policies, and operational procedures. Ensure the documentation is accessible to the operations team.
Provide training to the operations team on managing and troubleshooting Azure vWAN Secure Hub and Firewall Manager configurations.
Implement regular auditing procedures to verify compliance with security policies and regulatory requirements.
Regularly review and optimize network performance by analyzing traffic patterns and updating firewall policies as needed.
